name: Spaced Out (scofflawgames)
description:
WASD for movement

Q and E to barrel roll(double tap)

Left click to shoot

This game is in very early stages, and I could use some crucial feedback!
Made in about 12 hours of work total at the moment, not 100% sure,
just a guesstimate.

//Under Construction
